tool_description: Validates patient safety requirements including contraindications, allergies, pregnancy status, and implant compatibility for medical imaging procedures.

imaging_modality.description: Type of imaging: CT, MRI, X-ray, ultrasound, nuclear_medicine, fluoroscopy

contrast_required.description: Whether contrast agent will be used

pregnancy_status.description: Pregnancy status: unknown, not_pregnant, pregnant, possibly_pregnant

error_messages: Invalid patient ID: Patient ID must be a non-empty string and exist in the system.
Unsupported imaging modality: Use one of [CT, MRI, X-ray, ultrasound, nuclear_medicine, fluoroscopy].
Pregnancy contraindication: Pregnant patients require special protocols for radiation-based imaging.
Missing required weight: Patient weight is required when contrast_required is true.
Invalid pregnancy status: Use one of [unknown, not_pregnant, pregnant, possibly_pregnant].
usage: Provide patient_id, imaging_modality, and contrast_required. Optionally specify patient_weight_kg and pregnancy_status for enhanced safety validation.

safety_approved.description: Whether the patient is cleared for the imaging procedure

contraindications.description: List of identified contraindications or safety concerns

special_precautions.description: Required special precautions for the procedure
